sys_variable_value.value: Your holiday experience is now booked!﻿

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi there,

You will be pleased to know that your Harry potter Experience has been successfully booked with Dream Bookings.

Here is your flight booking number: Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Sys ID


Please contact Dream bookings customer support team if you have any questions or need to cancel your booking at anytime.

sys_variable_value.value: Send Customer details about their holiday package﻿
